text: is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-6. in Yamagata Prefecture.Soccerway.com, "Montedio Yamagata"; retrieved 2012-3-2. ==History== The club was founded in 1984. *1984-1995 NEC Yamagata SC *1996-present Montedio Yamagata ==League position== *2011 : J1 League - 18th *2012 : J2 League - 10th *2013 : J2 League - 10th *2014 : J2 League - 6th *2015 : J1 League - 18th *2016 : J2 League - 14th *2017 : J2 League - 11th *2018 : J2 League - 12th *2019 : J2 League - 6th *2020 : J2 League - 7th ===Former position=== ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams * List of Montedio Yamagata players == References == ==Other websites== * Montedio Yamagata website * J.League Club Guide Category:Japanese football clubs Category:Yamagata Prefecture
